com.teamten.typeset

Class BookLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamten.typeset.BookLayout

  • public class BookLayout
extends Object
    Manages the overall layout of the book. This includes the position and format of the page numbers, the section headers, etc. TODO this class has an awkward name. Maybe "Sections", since that's all it keeps track of.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BookLayout() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configureFromBookmarks(Bookmarks bookmarks)
      Look through the bookmarks to figure out where the body starts and, for any given page, what part and chapter it's in.
      String getHeadlineLabel(int physicalPageNumber, Config config)
      Return the string to display at the top center of the page.

      Returns the displayed page number label for the physical page number.
      Iterable<Map.Entry<Integer,SectionBookmark>> sections()
      Returns an ordered sequence of the sections in this document.

      Whether we should draw a headline on this page.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BookLayout

        public BookLayout()

    • Method Detail

      • configureFromBookmarks

        public void configureFromBookmarks(Bookmarks bookmarks)
        Look through the bookmarks to figure out where the body starts and, for any given page, what part and chapter it's in.

      • sections

        public Iterable<Map.Entry<Integer,SectionBookmark>> sections()
        Returns an ordered sequence of the sections in this document. The integer key is the physical page number.

      • shouldDrawHeadline

        public boolean shouldDrawHeadline(int physicalPageNumber)
        Whether we should draw a headline on this page.

      • getPageNumberLabel

        public String getPageNumberLabel(int physicalPageNumber)
        Returns the displayed page number label for the physical page number. The displayed page number might be in roman or arabic numerals.

      • getHeadlineLabel

        public String getHeadlineLabel(int physicalPageNumber,
                               Config config)
        Return the string to display at the top center of the page. This is usually based on the current part or chapter title.
